description: This is a Python source file defining the IngestionService class responsible for handling file uploads, parsing various document types, chunking text, generating embeddings, and storing vectors for a retrieval system.

classes.name: IngestionService
classes.description: A service class responsible for ingesting files, parsing content, chunking, generating embeddings, and managing storage and job statuses.

methods.name: __init__(self)
methods.description: Initializes the IngestionService with repositories, embedding client, vector store, and creates upload directory.

methods.name: IngestResponse ingest_upload(self, file: UploadFile, source_type: str, override_filename: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Handles the upload process, saves file temporarily, parses content, chunks text, generates embeddings, updates job status, and cleans up.

methods.name: List[Dict[str,Any]] _parse(self, stype: str, path: str)
methods.description: Parses the input file based on source type using appropriate parsers.

methods.name: _chunk_and_payload(self, units: List[Dict[str, Any]], filename: str, source_type: str)
methods.description: Splits text units into chunks, creates payloads with metadata and hashes for storage.

ctags.name: _chunk_and_payload
ctags.pattern: /^    def _chunk_and_payload(self, units: List[Dict[str, Any]], filename: str, source_type: str):$/
ctags.signature: (self, units: List[Dict[str, Any]], filename: str, source_type: str)

ctags.name: _parse
ctags.pattern: /^    def _parse(self, stype: str, path: str) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:$/

ctags.name: ingest_upload
ctags.pattern: /^    async def ingest_upload(self, file: UploadFile, source_type: str, override_filename: Optiona/
ctags.signature: (self, file: UploadFile, source_type: str, override_filename: Optional[str] = None)
